body:
I'm going to keep this brief. As you can tell by the title of this post I am properly leaving Avicus. I have decided my time on Avicus has come to an end. The main reasoning behind my decision is my lack of interest and enjoyment in Minecraft, and as a result my inactivity on Avicus.

My time on here has been an enjoyable one, mostly due to the awesome people that make up this community (however there are some exceptions). So all I can say is thank you Avicus.

I'm not going to make a list of people I would like to thank because it would be long but again, thank you all <3

-Echo
